application.name: Alpine
application.summary: Program for Internet News and Email

description.p: Alpine is a fast, easy to use email client that is suitable for both the inexperienced email user as well as for the most demanding of power users.

Alpine is based on the PineÂ® Message System, which was developed at the University of Washington, and was popular during the 1990s. It is a console application, and can be learned by exploration and the use of context-sensitive help.
